title: 2BR/1BA Miami River Home avail 8/15
posting_body: ["Free yourself from Brickell's gridlock without giving up life in the heart of Miami: Walk 5 min.", 'to Planet Fitness, Publix and all the shops at River Landing; Stroll 10 min.', 'to ride the Metro to work at Civic Center; Drive 15 min.', 'or less', "and you're at Wynwood, Midtown, MIA, a Marlins Game or even the Brightline.", "This original Florida duplex home (2BR/1BA) stands away from thoroughfares on a corner lot, between The Miami River and UM's medical complex.", 'Everything from the bathrooms to the appliances, landscaping and pest control has been refreshed or received full maintenance.', 'Even the roof was just redone by new ownership.', 'Enjoy ample open living area, an outdoor patio, and spacious bedrooms with closets.', 'There is both fenced and guest street parking galore.', '(Pardon our dust as we continue renovating, will update photos again later this week.)', 'First/last months and security deposit required upon 1-year lease signing.', 'Good credit score, no eviction history and background check required.', 'Landlord pays for water, renters responsible for electricity.', 'Please inquire about an open house Thursday after work.']
